절 포탈의 세계로 초대한 DemonStrate, Blizik, z1mb0bw4y, Inexistence, Gocnak에게 감사를 표합니다.
(그리고 최근에 알게된건데, 또 시간을 단축한 Imanex 유저의 스피드런 방법.. 연습중입니다 ㅠㅠ)
그리고 빌드5135버전 source unpack을 제공해 준 YaLTeR에세 감사를..ㅎㅎ
아마 포탈이 라스트 오브 어스 만큼의 인생게임이 아닐까... 싶네요.

Первая часть, не менее легендарной головоломки. Которая станет частью игры...(все и так всё знают, но мало ли, есть те кто еще не знаком с этой серией игр от любимых "Valve") Сюжет, есть. И это конец моего мнения. Ведь рассказано и сказано было максимум, еще до моего обзора. А впечатление остались такими же, как и у большинства, хорошими.

Don't know if Valve deletes negative reviews or not. :3

Anyway I don't have anything negative to say about Portal. This game is a must have puzzle game, only not worth the full price because it's rather short.
So get the portal bundle on a sale (everytime there's a reason to do a rather 'big' sale this game is part of it, so you shouldn't have to wait too long).

It's very short. I beat the main story within 2 hours, and that includes bathroom breaks. There are, however, challenge maps/advanced maps which I am finding to be very enjoyable to play through, as they are far more interesting/challenging than the story puzzles. 

Though this game is short, it is lovable through-and-through. The witty humor, the concept of portals, the gear-grinding puzzles, and of course the little turrets. I almost felt guilty as I smashed a turret into his friend, ending both of their... lives?

If you like to get time for your money, I recommend waiting to get this game on sale (or just getting the second one, as it has fan-made content for never-ending portal fun). If you like to get content/an enjoyable experience out of your money, I recommend picking this game up whenever you get the chance.

The story great, in my opinion. It becomes more evident towards the end, where at the start the only real understanding I had of the story was placing a portal on the floor, and one on the ceiling and entering a never-ending joyride while listening to Glados talk about cake. 

Over-all, 8/10. Time is important to me, but enjoyment overrides it, and I found myself enjoying everything about this game. Hell, I'll even bump it up to a 9/10 just for the credits. 

Hello? Are you still reading? I don't blame you... I'll miss you...

⬯…play this.

You need to…⬮
Das Spiel ist toll! Unbedingt kaufen! :D

Excelente juego, no hay nada más qué decir.
Una vez termines el juego completo, prueba los mapas avanzados/retos. Esto le da más dificultad al juego en sí.
Не тратьте время, качайте 2 часть сразу. Ожидал от первой части большего...

This has to be one of the most amzing games i have played. Though it didn't take long to complete it was all worth it, the puzzles and clever story throughout. I sadly prefer Portal 2 because i can play with my friends on co-op but nevertheless Portal is still a very good game, definitely worth playing.

Que GRAN SORPRESA!!!
Me han parecido las 6 horas mejor invertidas de los ultimos meses. Inmejorable!!
Empiezas con un poco de pereza al encontrarte con un FPS sin armas ni enemigos... pero poco a poco te va picando la curiosidad y el gusto por los retos que te pone esa voz en off del ordenador central.
Y nivel tras nivel vas poniendote a prueba y sonriendo cada vez que te pasas una pantalla y otra y otra y otra mas... todo el juego esta cuidado al detalle y la curva de dificultat te va atrapando poco a poco, nivel tras nivel.
No recomiendo empezar a jugarlo a una noche que trabajes al dia siguiente... 
Y, por el amor de Dios... no dejes de escuchar la cancion del final... es "la guinda del Pastel".

Portal is definitely not the best game I ever played, but I had some fun playing it. An idea to use portal mechanic to create puzzles absolutely got me. I understand that it's a rather old game for today's standards, but I'd like to point some flaws of it. 

Firstly, it's rather short. Completing the main story took me around 2 hours. Not much comparing with other games. Don't expect a long journey from it, but on the other side, it's the time well spent.

Secondly (that's gonna be a good one) - the puzzles were rather easy. I'm not telling it was a cakewalk (oops, that was an accident, I promise), but this game lacks real challenge aside from 6 advanced test chambers. That's only my opinion, though, I'd really appreciate to hear yours.

But there is also a thing I'd like to mention too - there are actually very few loading screens. Not like it has a crucial meaning, but it really makes you not die waiting.

Overall, I do not regret playing this game. Of course, every game has it flaws, but hey - nothing's perfect. 
Considering Portal's pros and cons, I can give it solid [b]7.5/10[/b]. See that game on sale? Buy it. Try it out.

...

Graphics? What the hell do you want from graphics? They're good, just enjoy the game itself.

Игра-совершенство. Кубик лучший друг.

Simple concept: enter room, solve puzzle, exit room, repeat.
You wake up in testing facility with no idea how you got there and are left with no choice but to follow the instructions of an AI that very soon begins to show signs of manic instability. It's a game who's tone could very easily have gone down a much darker path, but instead has great dark humor tone to it.
Like the old saying goes "Quality over quantity". It doesn't do much, but what it does it does well. Finished it on my first play through, which was 2 hours max, but it was one of the most unique and original game experiences I've ever had. Brilliant.
It is a very fun game it's not that long it can probably be beaten in less than an hour but it's still worth buying
Obra maestra sin mas.
great game

Now this is a really good game! It's kind of a puzzle type of game where you need to find a way to escape a room using logic. And we're not talking about some weird logic where you need to kick a wall three times, jump back two steps and a door appear (I've seen this): no this is some pretty logical stuff! 

You are also equiped with a portal gun which lets you spawn two portal doors: a really neat idea!

I will definitely replay this!
S2 <3 *u* esse jogo é uma maravilha a história é muito boa e basta achar os easter eggs pra deixar mais interessante!
Prefiero el Portal 2, al final no me gusto mucho por decir asi, es mi opinion personal...
classic

Amazing Game! Short but does have bonus maps, although for the price totally worth I loved it and the ending is amazing, although I will let those that haven't seen it find out for themselves because your really missing out! I don't have the best pc at all and I run it smoothly at good fps, I only got a few lag spikes that most pc's will not get (mine is just really old). I haven't really found anything wrong with it really other than it's a bit of a short game. So I give it a 9/10!

I owned this game for a long time and never payed it much thought. One rainy day with nothing to do I played it and beat it within 2 hours. No game has thus far impressed me so much and ended within 2 hours, this game is must play no matter who you are or what kind of games you like. Its witty, fun, creative, short and cheap. Buy it now and play it.

Que puedo decir...hace tiempo que vengo esquivando este juego puesto que pensé que no me iba a gustar en lo más mínimo….estaba totalmente equivocado! no podía parar de jugar!, simplemente una maravilla de juego, los puzzles, si bien no son difíciles, son extremadamente entretenidos y originales, la historia avanza a la perfección y te enseña a jugar progresivamente, los controles son precisos, los gráficos son una belleza, de los mejores juegos que he jugado.

Resumiendo, un juego que no se puede dejar pasar, historia increíble y un desafío equilibrado, sin duda un “must have”.
Magnífico juego. Combina el motor físico de half life que fué revolucionario cuando salió con un sistema de rompecabezas por niveles. Muy recomendable.

Zdecydowanie polecam! Jakiś czas temu miałem okazję zagrać w część drugą. Dziś, gdy przeszedłem jedynkę, muszę przyznać, iż jest to rzeczywiście dobry prekursor do kolejnej części. Mechanizm rozgrywki jest zbudowany w taki sposób, że naprawdę, nie byłem w stanie odczuć większego znużenia podczas gry. Jeżeli mam wymienić jakąś wadę, to będzie to zbyt krótka linia fabularna. Oryginalność, ładna grafika, świetne zagadki i niepowtarzalny klimat, który pochłonie chyba każdego - zdecydowanie jedna z najlepszych gier, w jakie przyszło mi grać.

The promise of cake was enough to make me froget i randomly ended up in a test facility some where, and to zoom through the puzzels to make it to my party in time.
i love the portal games, they're a great pass time, but i expected this to last longer, i completed it in like 1h 30 mins. Still really fun and "im still alive" :D

Nice game

This was one of the first games i got on steam, after my friend reccomended it to me. I was plesantly surprised to find it on slae at the time, along with portal 2. I bouth and downloaded these, and quickly fell in love with this series. All the conspiracies, theories and speculation in the fan bases are so intresting. After an incredible game, the credits blow you away and are worth the hours you put in to get to them. This game, along with its sequel, are my top games in my steam library to date, after almost a year and a half of aqquiring steam. I highly reccomend.

Es un juego que está muy bien si te gustan los puzzles. El modo historia se acaba en poco más de una hora si no has jugado nunca, esa es la pega. Pero tiene retos añadidos, sin embargo, estos retos son los mismos mapas que ves en la historia pero usando el mínimo de portales, mínimo de pasos o mínimo de tiempo. También encontraréis 6 mapas de la historia modificados para ser más complicados y a veces sí que suponen cierto reto. 

En definitiva, es un juego que merece la pena comprar aprovechando que esté en rebajas del 75% o más.
